title: Jersey Strong Since 1999
description: With over two decades of experience, Cleanomatic has become a trusted name in Monmouth County and beyond. We’re proud to say we've been “Keeping Jersey Clean Since 1999!”—and our track record speaks for itself.

title: Family-Owned, Client-Focused
description: Cleanomatic isn’t a faceless franchise—it’s a family-run operation led by David Derhi and his close-knit team. When you hire us, you’re getting the same care and attention we’d give our own homes. That’s The Cleanomatic Difference.

title: Licensed, Insured, and Always Prepared
description: Emergencies don’t wait—and neither do we. Cleanomatic is fully licensed, fully insured, and always ready to respond 24/7.

title: The Cleanomatic Guarantee
description: Our work isn’t finished until you say it is. David and his team are known for going the extra mile—returning if needed and treating every client like family.

title: Proudly Serving the Jersey Shore
description: From Lakewood to Point Pleasant, Jackson to Howell—Cleanomatic brings professionalism, reliability, and genuine warmth to every job.
